raw_comment:
I notice that a lot of 15-24 year olds say the world is getting better. This is much more than the 40+ year old. 
I wonder why the younger generation thinks the world is getting better and the older generation doesn't. What do the younger generation think and see?
This relates to my community because some people in my community think it's getting better and some think it's not. 
A catchy headline- Good V.S. Bad
ace_sentences: Many 15-24 year olds say that the world is getting better.
Fewer 40+ year olds say that the world is getting better.
I wonder why the younger generation thinks that the world is getting better.
I wonder why the older generation does not think that the world is getting better.
I wonder what the younger generation thinks.
I wonder what the younger generation sees.
This comment relates to my community.
Some people in my community think that the world is getting better.
Some people in my community think that the world is not getting better.
The headline is: Good vs. Bad.
